document.full_text: more than 70 militants armed with rockets and mortars attacked a security post on the outskirts of pakistan's northwestern city of peshawar on wednesday, the latest in an upsurge of violence since osama bin laden was killed in the country this month.
document.title: over 70 militants attack pakistani security post, 17 dead
lines_and_colors: more than 70 militants armed with rockets and mortars attacked a security post on the outskirts of pakistan's northwestern city of peshawar on wednesday, the latest in an upsurge of violence since osama bin laden was killed in the country this month.
